hero.description: Waxaan qaabeeyaa xalal casri ah oo tayo sare leh. Waxaan ku takhasusay tiknoolajiyadda web-ka, anigoo fikradaha adag u beddelaya barnaamijyo fudud oo dadku jecel yihiin.

skills.title: Xirfadaha Farsamo
skills.subtitle: Qalabka iyo tiknoolajiyada aan u isticmaalo dhisidda barnaamijyada.

projects.title: Mashaariicda Ugu Dambeeyay
projects.subtitle: Halkan ka eeg shaqooyinkii ugu dambeeyay ee aan qabtay.

services.title: Adeegyada Aan Bixiyo
services.subtitle: Xalal dhanka web-ka ah oo tayo sare leh, kuna habboon baahidaada.

web_dev.title: Horumarinta Webka
web_dev.desc: Dhisidda barnaamijyo casri ah oo awood badan iyadoo la isticmaalayo Next.js, React, iyo Node.js.

ui_ux.title: Naqshadeynta UI/UX
ui_ux.desc: Sameynta naqshado soo jiidasho leh oo fududeeynaya isticmaalka dadweynaha (User Experience).

mobile.title: Naqshad Responsive ah
mobile.desc: Xaqiijinta in website-kaagu si fiican ugu shaqeeyo kombiyuutarka, tablet-ka iyo moobilka.

security.title: Amniga Webka
security.desc: Hirgelinta nidaamyo amni oo sugan, ilaalinta xogta, iyo ka hortagga weerarada internetka.

api.title: Isku xirka API
api.desc: Dhisidda iyo isku xirka RESTful iyo GraphQL APIs si xogta si fudud loogu kala gudbiyo.

deployment.title: DevOps & Deployment
deployment.desc: Diyaarinta Server-ada, Cloud hosting (AWS/Vercel), iyo hagaajinta xawaaraha website-ka.

cta.title: Diyaar Ma U Tahay Mashruucaaga Xiga?
cta.subtitle: Aan fikirkaaga run ka dhigno. Hadda waan firaaqo ahay inaan ka wada shaqeyno mashaariicdaada.

testimonials.title: Mahadcelinta Macaamiisha
testimonials.subtitle: Dhageyso waxa ay ka yiraahdeen dadkii aan la shaqeeyay xalalka aan u dhisay.
